infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to show your current position on the safety map and provide location-based safety information.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs access to location to show your current position on the safety map and provide location-based safety information.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow A Safer Campus to use your location to show your current position on the safety map and provide location-based safety information.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow A Safer Campus to access your photos to add evidence to incident reports.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow A Safer Campus to access your camera to take photos for incident reports.
